column1: Will I get an email reminder for upcoming Birthdays of my friends?
column2: Yes, you will receive automatic email reminders for upcoming Birthdays of your friends.

column1: Where can I view all the Birthdays of my friends?
column2:
To view all the Birthdays of your friends, please follow the steps mentioned below:
1. Click on “Home” from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Click on “Birthdays” from the quick-links available in the left of the page.
3. You will be redirected to a page having a list of all your friends and their Birthdays with an option to send them messages and greetings.

column1: My problem is not listed above. What should I do now?
column2: If your problem is not listed above, then please contact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site. Let us know your problem and we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
